description: The most important step is setting the tiles correctly at the drain. I back flat-troweled these 4" porcelain tiles and set them 1/16" from the grate. The critical part is making the drain level yet slightly lower than the tiles. If you're tiling a shower floor and need help, join our Video Library at homerepairtutor.com
title: Tile Shower Floor Tips - #shorts #homerepairtutor
